actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill establishing under the Secretary of Agriculture a 5-year research program seeking to control the gypsy moth, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes, under the Secretary of Agriculture, a five-year research program to effectuate the control of the gypsy moth. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to institute and carry out such program during the next 5 fiscal years ending June 30, 1978.

titles.title: A bill establishing under the Secretary of Agriculture a 5-year research program seeking to control the gypsy moth, and for other purposes.
